title: I can no longer send an email
content: this last night I was able to send out a message to someone. Now I tried to send another email and the send button is greyed out. Why??
creator: bluangel33

title: Where are the attachments? And how do I scroll messages and inbox list?
content:
I'm having troubles with Thunderbird version 140.6.0esr(64-bits) on Ubuntu 25.10 (fully updated). It's installed as a snap.

The first problem is that I have a selected mail with an attachment, but nowhere in the mail itself I can see or find or open or download that attachment.

The second problem is that for the inbox and mail body I can't scroll. There are no scrollbars, and the mouse-wheel doesn't work.

Is it a problem with snap? With Ubuntu? Or with Thunderbird itself? Could if be a configuration problem (I've tried quite a lot of things already)?
creator: joachim.pileborg

title: Novo Perfil em Thunderbird Portable Edition
content: Nas respostas em pesquisas que fiz para encontrar como criar um Novo Perfil no Thunderbirdportable, me sugerem de executar o aplicativo com um -P (p maiúsculo) após o nome do executável. Pois fiz isso e o comando foi ignorado. Pergunto à comunidade como entro no menu de gerar novo Perfil na versão Portable do Thunderbird. Agradeço a ajuda. att walter
creator: WalterTabax

title: move all data for thunderbird from windows to Linux
content:
I've been using Thunderbird for years under windows 7 and keep my data on a separate drive. Is it possible to migrate or move the whole program and data base into Linux at a later date? I haven't used Linux yet, but need to know if it's possible to successfully make the move before I jump. Thank you.

I didn't find anything quite like this in the forums.
creator: gshantz

title: Double click on single click
content: When I single click on email or delete email I sometimes get a double click response. Meaning I want to delete one email in the subject line and single click the delete button it will delete two messages. This is not just one computer this is happing on. I am using on all my computers Logitech trackball mice M570. I tried trouble shoot mode and it still dose it. Thank you Bret
creator: bikejunky2

title: Multiple TO fields in Thunderbird email
content: When I'm composing an email, I only have 1 TO field. I can't see a way to create more than one TO field. I can get 1 CC field and 1 BCC field, but I can't get more than one of any of them. I used to be able to get more than 1. Where did this feature go? I am on the latest version 146.0.1 (64 bit) Thanks, Scuter
creator: scuter
